author: mmusich
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43059

#### PR description:

In https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43020#issuecomment-1764543700 it was noticed that one of the pixel payload inspector tests was very noisy.
In https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43020#issuecomment-1767264420 is was elucidated that the reason can be traced back to this commit https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/5af9d665f48ccbfff7c49a4b6243c9124b37a189, that - while supplying in `TrackerTopology` the provision to distinguish in the Phase-2 IT barrel layer 1 two sensors per module - at the same time (since the change in the meaning of the bit masks was not propagated to `StandaloneTrackerTopology`) it also created a bug in all the clients that at that point started to silently fail correctly parsing the topology from XML.  
This is fixed in commit 3e07a3cbfccafb388da67940dd0e1b4806495ce8.
In this PR I also provide a unit test, to avoid future possible mismatches between the two mechanisms 03732422cd2e55f4b70c65ef3afcea1b2b90c738, as well as some other miscellaneous improvements in the Pixel Payload Inspector suite that were useful during debugging.

#### PR validation:

Relies on the newly created unit test, `scram b runtests_CalibTrackerStandaloneTrackerTopologyTestDriver` which runs fine with this PR.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Verbatim backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43059 to the release in which the problem in description first occurrred.
title: [13.2.X] Fix `StandaloneTrackerTopology` and providing unit tests
